Qualifiers.Scope: Architectural features related to porches and entry features
Qualifiers.Applicability: All porches and entry features as described

Mandatory: Entry feature > 12' in height counts twice (footprint)
2nd floor roofed or enclosed porches, arcades, balconies, porticos, breezeways count once

Explicit deviations: Entry feature ≤ 12' in height does not count
1st floor recessed porches < 10' in depth and open on exterior side do not count

Qualifiers.Applicability: All attic spaces and equivalent areas as described

Numerical values.Exemption: Unusable attic space for Category 1 & 2 historic homes

Mandatory: All 2nd floor space where head height or distance from top of floor to bottom of rafter is ≥ 5' counts once
2nd floor equivalent areas where height from top of first floor to top of roof material is > 17' count twice
3rd floor equivalent areas where height from top of first floor to top of roof material is ≥ 26' count three times

Explicit deviations: Attic space where floor to under side of roof rafter distance is ≤ 5' does not count
Special cases: 3rd floor equivalent, where roof pitch is ≥ 4:12 — 200 sf exempt
Unusable attic space for Category 1 & 2 historic homes — 500 sf exempt

Standards: Compliance with patio & lightwell requirements of 18.12.070

Explicit deviations: Basements that comply with patio & lightwell requirements of 18.12.070 do not count
Basements of Category 1 & 2 historic homes or contributing structures in a historic district (even if > 3') do not count

Mandatory: Architectural appendages like fireplace or buttress footprint count once

Explicit deviations: Bay windows (if ≥ 18" above interior floor, does not project > 2', and > 50% windows) do not count
